xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 6 Kusalattika, Kilesagocchaka » 6.1 Kusalattika, Kilesaduka » 6.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Kusalattika, Kilesagocchaka
Kusalattika, Kilesaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
1.
1436Akusalaṃ kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1437Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1438(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
2.
1439Kusalaṃ nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
1440Akusalaṃ nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
1441Abyākataṃ nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1442Kusalaṃ nokilesañca abyākataṃ nokilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1443Akusalaṃ nokilesañca abyākataṃ nokilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
3.
1444Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ, avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
4.
1445Kusalo nokileso dhammo kusalassa nokilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1446Abyākato nokileso dhammo abyākatassa nokilesassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
5.
1447Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa…pe…  avigate terasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
<< 6.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāraup6.2 Kusalattika, Saṃkilesikaduka >>
